title: Vigil
description: For Alice and Deb, a romantic Christmas dinner ends abruptly with a passionate argument. A tragic accident leaves Alice in a coma and Deb in a sea of guilt and pain before the harsh words can be taken back. Now the doctors say that all they can do is wait. It is up to Deb to draw her lover back with tales of the past and promises for the future. The magic of New Year's approaches, and Deb prays that a midnight kiss will end her Vigil.
author: Kathleen Tudor
